text: EggHunt Records is an independent record label based in Richmond, Virginia. The label was founded by Adam Henceroth and Gregory Gendron in spring of 2014. EggHunt Records focuses on independent artists. It releases material on cassette, CD, and vinyl physical formats, as well as digital download and streaming online. EggHunt Records maintains an active roster of artists who have toured with notable acts such as The War on Drugs and Houndmouth. EggHunt Records alumni include Lucy Dacus, whose debut album, No Burden, was released on EggHunt Records in 2016. In 2017, EggHunt Records signed Eric Slick of Dr. Dog to release his solo debut album, Palisades. Other notable releases have included Pearla's Quilting & Other Activities (2019) and Camp Howard's Juice EP 2017. As of August of 2020, EggHunt Records has released 47 releases and continues to support up and coming indie rock artists. ==Artists== ===Current=== * Suburban Living * Pearla * Thin Lear * Deau Eyes * Molly Drag * Majjin Boo * Clever Girls * Gold Connections * Grace Vonderkuhn * Little Coyote ===Former=== * Lucy Dacus * Daddy Issues * Camp Howard * Minor Poet * Manatree * White Laces * OPIN * Sun Machines * Feral Conservatives * Sun Machines * Big Baby * Mekong Xpress * Dazeases * Red States * Doll Baby * The Diamond Center * DIET * OKO TYGRA * Eric Slick == References == Category:American independent record labels Category:American record labels
title: EggHunt Records
